contents.title: Content Wind
contents.description: A lightweight Nuxt theme to build a Markdown driven website, based on Nuxt Content, TailwindCSS and Iconify ‚ú®

children.value: A lightweight Nuxt theme to build a Markdown driven website, based on
Create Vue components and use them in Markdown
Deploy on any Node or Static hosting: GH Pages, Vercel, Netlify, Heroku, etc.
Open a terminal and run the following command:
Follow the instructions in the terminal and you are ready to go üöÄ
This template has some built-in features to make it as easy as possible to create a content-driven website.
